segments.text: Peeking into this kitchen, everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets with the cookie jar catch my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, arm extended inside it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Didn't expect to see kids raiding like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, joining the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool is leaning back precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over at the sink, water is overflowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman focused on her dish, foot in the wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How has she not heard or felt it yet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so still and pretty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the indoor hazards stand out more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a tense little scene unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I'm worried for them all.
segments.speaker: PAR
